content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day March 13, 2018 Google Drive  Security Best Practices for External Sharing on Content Collaboration Platforms March 13, 2018 The Security Best Practices for External Sharing on Content Collaboration Platforms blog series examines the state of security for external sharing on the leading Content Collaboration Platforms CCP. Each week well review a different platform and make security best practice recommendations.
